alert.note: Alert for Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 3:34AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow, mainly light. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches in the lower elevations, and 4 to 8 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Southwest Big Horn Basin and Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains. This includes Thermopolis and the Wind River Canyon. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads will be slick and hazardous in spots, mainly this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southwest Big Horn Basin
